com.untitled.game.state

Class State<I extends java.lang.Enum,S extends java.lang.Enum>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.untitled.game.state.State<I,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - an Input enum
    S - a State enum

    public class State<I extends java.lang.Enum,S extends java.lang.Enum>
extends java.lang.Object
    A State which can transition to other States, based on a certain Input. Closely relates to a Finite State Machine.
